dbOper.sql: alter table T_CUSTOMER add PLURALITY_OCCUPATION_CODE_NAME VARCHAR(128,0);
alter table T_CUSTOMER add PLURALITY_OCCUPATION_CODE_TYPE VARCHAR(128,0);
insert into [T_CODE] values('nativeplace', 'DPR', null, '朝鲜', null, null);
insert into [T_CODE] values('idtype', 'I', null, '外国人永久居留证', null, null);
delete from T_OCCUPATION  where OCCUPATION_CODE  like '9%';
